relevant_communication:
- UNODC CDN 60th Session, Vienna, Austria, Side Event presentation on International Project DAWA Portugal Results related with strategic communication campaign on drug awareness on adults 
- Public Interest Annual Social Drug awareness Cause Communication Campaign #ListenFirst implemented in June 
- Participation on Post UNGASS 2016 as a member of  Dianova International netowrk and VNGOC 
- Conclusion of Transnational project on Health Communication "Drug Addictions Awareness on Adults" 2015-2016 in partnership with EURAD (Netherlands), Green Crescent Society and Istanbul Public Health Institute (Turkey), NTAAK (Lithuania) 
- National Coordinator for Portugal of European Commission campaign "European Youth Event 2016 by European Parliament 
- EXIT Magazine 30 issues published since 2004 
- School and community awareness health promotion initiative "Mocktails", a UN Best Prevention Practice since 2009, reaching directly more than 30.000 people
legal_status: Instituição Particular de Solidariedade Social, Associação de Utilidade Pública e Organização Não-Governamental para o Desenvolvimento
